clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Well-defined nodule measuring 32 mm in left lower lobe.
Interstitial thickening and reticular pattern in left lower lobe.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in left lower lobe.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in left lower lobe.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
